“Just as nobody ever knew
the reason I’d always flown higher
or pushed further or run faster or given more: to let flow the...
caption:
“Just as nobody ever knew the reason I’d always flown higher or pushed further or run faster or given more: to let flow the awakening stars beneath my skin, though I didn’t know why I craved them, or what they were…” – Captain Marvel

summary: It’s pretty remarkable how people can judge Brie Larson’s performance in Captain Marvel just by looking at the trailers. ‘she...
body:
It’s pretty remarkable how people can judge Brie Larson’s performance in Captain Marvel just by looking at the trailers. ‘she looks bored’ ‘at least wonder woman had facial expression’ ‘the cat is better at acting’

It just seem pretty obvious that Carol was ‘brainwashed’ and that her ‘bored expression’ is just part of what the kree turned her into?

Anyway, to people who go ‘well, that’s the first Marvel movie I won’t be seeing and it will flop’ lol byyye we won’t miss you

summary: The Jack Katz Podcast Conversation Part 2: The Replication of our Downfall and Our Steps into Wonder
title: The Jack Katz Podcast Conversation Part 2: The Replication of our Downfall and Our Steps into Wonder
body:
The Jack Katz Podcast Conversation Part 2: The Replication of our Downfall and Our Steps into Wonder

https://radiopublic.com/storytelling-with-seth-6nPwKj/ep/s1!bfc84 Replication & Where we left off…

When we left off our conversation with Jack, a time traveler had arrived from the future, only to find he was not far enough in the past. The computers had taken over. The machines created by the computers attend to everything people needed and it made humans weak. Things sounded grim.

Replic…

View On WordPress

summary: If you don’t believe that Avengers: Endgame will end because Valkyrie and Loki come off a alien ship last minuet, drunk as hell,...
body: If you don’t believe that Avengers: Endgame will end because Valkyrie and Loki come off a alien ship last minuet, drunk as hell, Valkyrie falls of a ramp onto an explosive that then flys into Thanos and explodes his head then don’t even talk to me because that is how it will end

blog.name: binkybarnes777
blog.title: friday im in love start playin

summary: tony saves himself
body:
tony saves himself

  • he’s going to die tomorrow morning
  • he’s sent out all his messages
  • there’s no one coming for him
  • when thanos threw the moon, a shard damaged the fuel tank
  • they’ve been drifting around for weeks after they ran out
  • “hey, nebula, I’m going to die soon no matter what. you take the escape pod, you kill thanos for me. he hurt you more than he hurt me.”
  • Nebula, as much as she cares for her unexpected friend, can’t deny his dying wish and needs revenge
  • She gives tony a space suit, just in case
  • Tony gets comfortable as he can, going to bed for the last time
  • He’s lived a good life, made an impact, saved the world a couple times, made some friends along the way, some really good friends…
  • He tells himself he is ready to go
  • He isn’t
  • He thinks about pepper and Rhodey and happy, and even Steve and Natasha and Clint, especially Thor and Bruce…
  • They can’t all be gone
  • They need his help too
  • Something clicks
  • “Looks like we’re out of fuel, buddy. Guess we have to walk from here.”
  • Tony didn’t know where it was from, some old movie he watched at the tower, maybe something rhodey and him watched back in MIT
  • He had the spacesuit, he could use what’s left of his nanotech
  • He was running out of air and out of time now
  • He puts the thing on his chest, over the arc reactor, and it expands over his entire body
  • He hopes it won’t interfere with his tech
  • He concentrates on getting the fastest and most efficient blasters
  • Going out into space is a weird feeling
  • He can look any way and the only thing he is relatively close to is the broken ship
  • He’s memorized exactly where he was and where the ship had been pointed, after getting trapped for weeks
  • He remembers which way to earth best, as it was the one he thought about most
  • He’s tired, dehydrated, low on oxygen
  • But he’s had worse, hasn’t he?
  • He goes straight to the compound, hoping to find pepper
  • She’s there, but so are all the other original avengers and a strange blonde glowy woman
